posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 设定hexo的「about」页面遇到的问题
posts.text: 配置新主题后，发觉about界面是没配置的，后来创建about页面的过程遇到一些问题，点击链接显示Cannot GET /about/后来发现 hexo g 会报错ERROR Process failed: about/index.mdTypeError: Cannot read property ‘utcOffset’ of null上网查，配置文件里timezone我之前设成GMT+8是不行的把timezone改为Asia/Shanghai重新hexo g生成，再启用就搞掂 参考链接：https://blog.csdn.net/liting1996/article/details/79024714

posts.title: Hexo常用指令
posts.text: 新增文章1$ hexo new "文章标题" More info: Writing 本地执行，启用localhost:40001$ hexo s More info: Server 生成静态文件1$ hexo g More info: Generating 推到Git1$ hexo d More info: Deployment
